dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 587 IH: To remove the lesser prairie-chicken from the lists of threatened species and endangered species published pursuant to the Endangered Species Act of 1973 and to amend that Act to exclude the lesser prairie-chicken from the authority of that Act.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Mann (for himself, Mrs. Bice, Mr. Estes, Mr. Arrington, Mr. Newhouse, Mr. Lucas, Mr. Schmidt, Mr. Brecheen, Mr. Bacon, Mr. Palmer, Mr. Perry, Mr. Hunt, Mr. McClintock, Mr. Babin, Mr. Self, and Mr. Baird) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To remove the lesser prairie-chicken from the lists of threatened species and endangered species published pursuant to the Endangered Species Act of 1973 and to amend that Act to exclude the lesser prairie-chicken from the authority of that Act.

subsection.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the lesser prairie-chicken (Tympanuchus pallidicinctus), including each distinct population segment of the lesser prairie-chicken, is removed from the lists of threatened species and endangered species that are published pursuant to the Endangered Species Act of 1973 (16 U.S.C. 1531 et seq.).

subsection.header: Exclusion of lesser prairie-Chicken from listing
subsection.text: Section 4(a) of the Endangered Species Act of 1973 (16 U.S.C. 1533(a)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking The Secretary shall by regulation and inserting Except as provided in paragraph (4), the Secretary shall by regulation; and
by adding at the end the following:
The Secretary may not make a determination under this subsection that the lesser prairie-chicken (Tympanuchus pallidicinctus) is threatened or endangered.
